attributes.action: Do not use tax payers money to bail out the banking system. Instead, stimulate the economy  by reducing income tax for all so we have more money to spend.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is typical of this country to try and stimulate anything national from the top. The so called 'top' is where we have obviously failed! Will stimulating the failed banking sector with free money solve the current national economic crisis? Instead of burdening the tax payer for generations to come one could be gallant and give them something for years to come. Why are the leaders  making free money available to banks for them to re-loan this money. The source of economic growth is not perpetual!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
